In this post, I walk through how I used [Quarto](https://quarto.org), [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/), and [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/) to build a personal-professional website.

## 1. Setting Up Quarto

Start by installing Quarto and initializing your website:

\`\`\`bash quarto create-project mysite --type website cd mysite
